channel.title: Hybrid PVP v3 pvp area
channel.description: So my server apparently doesnt have safe pk. When someone gets killed, they lose items. How can i make it so no one loses items in safe pk? I also need to make it so no one can get pk points in safe pk zones.

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 pvp area
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

ok so basicly you need to add it to your givelife.

public void giveLife() { //Client o = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c.isDead = false; c.faceUpdate(-1); c.freezeTimer = 0; if(c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait()) { // if we are not in a duel we must be in wildy so remove items if (!CastleWars.isInCw(c) && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights == 2) {
yours will look slightly diferent to mine possibly but you want to add your safepk area into this part

that will let players keep their items when they die in that area

Read full topic
